context.p: In this topic you will learn how to configure oXygen to run over the currently opened XML file.

step.cmd: In oXygen, select the menu item Tools External Tools Configure..
Press the New button to add a new external tool
Enter into the Command Line field: cmd /c chemistry -in ${cf} -css my-style.css -out ${cfd}/${cfne}.pdf -show-pdf
step.info: On Mac OS or Linux, use : chemistry.sh -in ${cf} -css my-style.css -out ${cfd}/${cfne}.pdf -show-pdf

info.note: Use the full path to the script chemistry.cmd if you haven't configured the PATH environment variable to point to the installation directory. If the installation directory contains spaces, use quotes around the full path of the script.
